title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 297.4 - Installation costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 297.4 - Installation costs

State Regulations

Antenna support structures and antenna transmission line
conduits are available at some of the State Buildings. Use of these facilities
will be permitted at no charge to the extent that they are available. If
additional antenna support structures or transmission line conduits are
required, all installation costs and expenses shall be the sole responsibility
of the user. Ownership of facilities shall rest in the State of New York and be
subject to joint use. The installation of these facilities shall be made by or
under the direct supervision of Office of General Services
personnel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
297.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
